mapper.select: SELECT B.ifeed, A.iuser AS writerIuser, B.contents, B.location , A.nm AS writerNm, B.created_at AS createdAt, A.pic AS writerPic , if(C.ifeed IS NULL, 0, 1) AS isFav FROM t_user A JOIN t_feed B ON A.iuser = B.iuser LEFT JOIN t_feed_fav C ON B.ifeed = C.ifeed AND A.iuser = #{loginedIuser} ORDER BY B.ifeed DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{rowCount}
